title: Who Gets Promoted, Who Doesn't, and Why by Donald Asher (Perseu)
description:
According to career guru Donald Asher, advancement at work is
less about skill sets and more about strategy. Who Gets Promoted,
Who Doesn't, and Why details exactly what puts one employee on
the fast track to an exceptional career, while another stays on
the treadmill to mediocrity. For those new to the workforce as
well as those feeling overlooked, this book reveals the secrets
to climbing the career ladder, including common mistakes most
workers don't know they're making, insider information about
how corporations really make promotion decisions, and the ten
proven strategies for career advancement.

Who Gets Promoted, Who Doesn't, and Why, Second Edition:
12 Things You'd Better Do If You Want to Get Ahead
By: Donald Asher
Format: EPUB
Language: EN
Pages: 401
ISBN13: 9781607746010
